The performance of athletic-coded masculinity on the concert dance stage / Maura Keefe -- Transcending gender in ballet's lines / Jill Nunes Jensen -- The performance of unmarked masculinity / Ramsay Burt -- Pricked dances: the spectator, dance, and masculinity in early 18th-century England / John Bryce Jordan -- Gender trumps race? choreography by Doris Humphrey ; analysis anc coaching by Ernestine Stodelle ; additional coaching by Gail Corbin

The Doris Humphrey legacy series of documentaries gives behind-the-scenes analysis of each movement, phrase-by-phrase, of five Doris Humprhrey works: Air for the G string, The call/breath of fire, The shakers, Two estatic themes and Water study. Ernestine Stodelle, an original member of the Humphrey-Weidman Company, provides meticulous, inspiring coaching and commentary for each dance. Every film concludes with a complete performance of the work

Enth.: L' aura des baleins. Filá. El manisero. Venelite. Kenokenoke. Cancro crú. Ami kangal. Dhol intro, GoDEvil (Medley). Lululárom. Al Ol. Návdi. Na dolinie. On the beach. Le rap à ti-pétang. Marv eo ma mestrez. Afra-Polka. Vun Nord na Süd. Welcome in sweet Vienna.

Enth.: Ecco la primavera. Flos filius lius. Ductia. Exiit diluculo. Sigurdlied. Trotto. Ich spring an diesem Ringe. Pase el agua. Dit le Bourgignon. Der Tröscher. Un cavalier. La gatta. Sauff's aus. Schiarazula. Paur ins Holz. Es wollt ein Fraw. Danseryen. Bransle de Champaigne. Ballo P. Bransle gay. Die Sackpfeifen. Bransle de chevaux

Enth.: Jubilemus-Signal, aus Ludus Danielis jubilemus regi nostro. Veris dulcis; Fas et nefas, aus Carmina burana. Totentanz. Branle d'ecosse. Platerspiel. Branle de chevaux. Stella splendens, Totus floreo. Como poden, aus Cantigas de Santa Maria. Ungaresca. Fas et nefas. Trotto. Ai vis lo lop. Skudrinka. Branle de Bourgogne. Sciarazula Marazula. Woll auff wir wellen slauffen. Kchühorn-Signal

Enth.: Der @dritte Mann, Laboda. Apo xeno topo. Er sieht sie an, während sie ihn ansieht und er sieht zur Tür. Bubamaka. What am I bid? Fighting on the same side. Marielied. Nienafing. Tyne anew. Besame mucho. Chemtengure. Badutspringeren. Reality shock. Alle Vöglein sind schon weg. Candy man. Beyrouth ecoeurée. My way. Signora Luna. Zum kleinen Tod. There is still time. - Aufn.: 2. - 4. Juli 2004, live

Enth.: Ch'ami la vita mia. A che tormi il ben mio. Non si levav'ancor. E dicea l'una. S'andasse amor a caccia. O com' è gran martire. Ch'io non t'ami. Anima mia perdona. Che se tu se il cor mio. O Mirtillo. Era l'anima mia gia presso. M'è piu dolce il penar.
